posts.post_title: FS: T207 Hank Severeid, Napoleon back SGC 40 ~Sold
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is the harder back for the Recruit class T207s, a Napoleon Little Cigars backed Hank Severeid

[STRIKE]Asking $135[/STRIKE]
T207 Napoleon ~ Hank Severoid (sic), SGC 40
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=466&pictureid=19087[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=466&pictureid=19088[/IMG]

Please reply, pm me or email me if interested

Thanks for looking
Jack
Christmas bump and lowered the card a bit
